SQLStringContainer.ePayroll.UpdateMainLogic: Update PAYCALCULATEMAINLOGIC Set MAINSCRIPT = @SCRIPT Where BUSINESSUNITID=@BUSINESSUNITID and MAINLOGICID = @ID
SQLStringContainer.ePayroll.UpdateScript: Update PAYPAYROLLSCRIPT Set SCRIPTCONTENT = @SCRIPT Where BUSINESSUNITID=@BUSINESSUNITID and SCRIPTID = @ID
